articles.author: Marita Moloney
articles.title: The areas deemed 'safe' for Irish tourists as grim update given for Spain, Portugal and more - Irish Mirror
articles.description: There are several European holiday hotspots struggling to contain the spread of Covid-19
articles.content:
Irish holidaymakers are being warned to avoid certain regions in Europe as coronavirus cases continue to surge.
Thousands of sun-seekers have been taking advantage of the EU Digital Green Cert since… [+2909 chars]

articles.author: Amy Judd
articles.title: COVID-19 vaccines now mandatory for all B.C. long-term and assisted living staff - Global News
articles.description: Several major European countries, including France, Italy and Greece, have already implemented mandatory vaccines.
articles.content:
B.C. health officials announced new orders Thursday that everyone who works in long-term care and assisted living facilities in the province must be vaccinated against COVID-19.
